features: 【Powerful Brushless Motor Electric Air Duster】: The compressed air duster adapts a powerful brushless motor, featuring stable airflow, durability and high performance. Its strong power, with abundant nozzles and brushes, making the electric air dusters for cleaning the stubborn heavy dust at any places easily.

【Portble Air Duster with 2 Speeds】:The PeroBuno air duster is equipped with 2-gear speeds for dust cleaning. Use the standard wind speed for the daily cleaning like the PC laptops, fans, camera lens and car models. The strong wind speed is great for cleaning air vent and large machine. Long press the button 3 seconds to start, and short press to switch to the strong speed.

【Compressed Air Duster + Mini Vacuum in One】: Alternative to canned air compressed air can, this is not only an air dust, but also a mini handheld vacuum, up to 18kpa suction power. Two cleaning ways are convenience for cleaning the computer, desk, PC, car, electronics. You can also take it as an air pump for storage bags. 3 functions make it a great helper in home or car cleaning.

【Keyboard Cleaner With Various Accessories 】: The multi-use electric air duster comes with keyboard cleaning kit, which contains a variety of accessories. The mini brushes and long nozzles for hard-to-reach areas, and a wide flat nozzle expands the sucking areas. One portable cordless car vacuum cleaner can help you handle with daily housework, like cleaning computers keyboards, car seats, window blinds, sofas and so on.

【Cordless Air Blower with Rechargeable Battery】 : This air duster blower is a great alternative to canned air spray, which is energy-saving and eco-friendly. The battery is equipped with a Type-C charging cable, and can be charged with various USB port devices. After fully charged within 3-4 hours, the mini blower can run continuously for 15-25 minutes.
body.description: PeroBuno Cordless Air Duster & Mini Vacuum for Computer, Laptop, Interior Car, Desk Cleaning Upgraded Powerful Electric Compressed Air Duster & Vacuum Cleaner with Rechargeable Battery, Brushless Motor PeroBuno new computer duster is designed with upgraded powerful brushless motor, which produces super strong airflow. And, it comes with multiple accessories ( Blowing/ Vcuuming/ Pumping Nozzles & Brushes ) , including computer cleaning kit. The rechargeable pc air duster is the best gift for your friend. 1 PC= Air Duster + Mini Vacuum + Air Pump 1 HEPA Filter and 1 Steel Filter for Your Exchange. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It sucks! It blows! And that’s exactly what you want!
reviews.reviewText: this is kind of a must if you have any little spaces that are tough to get into, which I think most people do. It comes with a little storage bag which helps you keep all the parts together really easily. It makes cleaning kind of… fun?? Huh??This, combined with my Rubbermaid corner scrubber thing that looks like a toothbrush, lets my ADHD arse keep my apartment that much cleaner in a way I can tolerate that’s not fatiguing.Also, it’s an easier way for me to dust since I’m sensitive to dust.It’s not massively powerful, but powerful enough for what it’s meant for, and the battery life could probably be a little longer, but again it’s meant more for small spots and details, not for your whole carpet, you know?Overall, useful little gadget that I can recommend for sure!

reviews.reviewerName: A great investment. Not too big I love the size of it. Works flawlessly. Happy with my purchase.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for your everyday set up works flawlessly good strength and a vacuum and blower function is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The project only lasted a few months before it could no longer be recharged…
reviews.reviewText: The project only lasted a few months before it could no longer be recharged, but the seller extended the warranty for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Mediocre, but still decent for price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the purpose of cleaning excess dust out electronics (computers and servers). My intent was to replace using enviroduster cans since they get expensive. The additional objective of this purchase was to have a small vacuum to suck up the main part of the dust instead of just blowing it all over. The vacuum part of this works reasonably well, my only complaint is the battery life. I have to charge it between each computer or server cleaning, if it lasts through the whole process. For the blower purposes, it's pretty weak. I tried using both high and low power to blow dust out of tight places and it's effectiveness is minimal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked well, once. Sturdy design. The manual states if the unit shuts down to recharge it. So I did. It starts and then quits after about 2 seconds. The filter is not clogged. It might have something to do with the 'soft' switch that needs to be pressed for a moment before it starts. Nice case! Do not buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: I bought it for work. I use it to clean elevator and Automatic sliding door tracks. Plenty of attachments to get the job done. Pretty strong vacuum too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Been cleaning around the car with this and the bedroom, kitchen, you name it I've cleaned it with this tool! highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product, good quality and as described. Would buy again!

Vielfältig. Hat verschiedene Aufsätze. Ich benutze diesen für Kleinigkeiten im Haushalt. Z.B. Schublade aussaugen oder auch Trockner sauber machen.Und die Pustefunktion habe ich verwendet um z.B. Schaum an nicht zugänglichen Stellen am Bike wegzupusten. Top!Leider ist eine Saudauer nicht al zu lange, allerdings wurde das auch beschrieben.Zu reinigen ist er einfach.
Durch die vielseitige Einsatz sehr gut
Weder Saug- noch Blasleistung zufriedenstellend. Sehr laut. Rücksendung wird so kompliziert und teuer, dass man darauf verzichtet.NIE WIEDER PeroBuno !!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Der taugt absolut nichts auf keinen Fall kaufen
reviews.reviewText: Der saugt ganz schwach auf keinen Fall kaufen es ist Betrug wenn man den Sauger zurück schicken soll sollte man 50 Euro Porto zahlenSeit bitte vorsichtig
